constituent: laundry, water, water droplets, water pistol, futon, feathers, wings, turkey
koohiiStory1: At the laundry you stuff your large futon (made from turkey feathers) in the machine, thereby causing it to break -- as shown by the water spurting out the side.
koohiiStory2: When turkeys do the laundry, they put their feathers in water (they don´t have clothes).
myStory: giặt rũ. tưới nước vào lông chim để giặt quần áo
